content: this e-reader cosy is designed to fit the kobo libra and is worked to a standard dk-weight gauge of 22 stitches and 28 row per 4 inches or 10cm gauge is a guideline but not critical the cosy has about an inch of negative ease so that it holds your device snugly but it s not the end of the world if it s not bang-on gauge you will need a total of approx 25g of yarn or 50-60m the contrast colour can be a small scrap of whatever you have left either dk or fingering weight held double 2g is more than enough the sample uses two strands of woolyknit british wool 4ply in the rose mix colourway fingering weight held together and an oddment of west yorkshire spinners colour lab dk in arctic white for the contrast **finished measurements** 5 75 x 6 25 inches after light blocking
